summary.Title: Café Europa 1989 is looking for waiters with a brilliant mood and strong oppinions about service
summary.JobHeadline: Café Europa 1989 is looking for waiters with a brilliant mood and strong oppinions about service
summary.Presentation: Café Europa 1989 is a café in the heart of Copenhagen, which is run with proud traditions and a mission to create unique experiences for our guests through attentive and sustainable work routines.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Café Europa 1989 is looking for waiters with a brilliant mood and strong oppinions about service
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Café Europa 1989 is a café in the heart of Copenhagen, which is run with proud traditions and a mission to create unique experiences for our guests through attentive and sustainable work routines. We are looking for skilled waiters, who are driven by being on the floor and providing great service to our guests.

You will be part of a good mix of approx. 35 full-time and part-time waiters, who together will ensure that Cafe Europa's high level of service is maintained day after day. Your experience and your mood is important for the café to be 100% ready to welcome our guests every day from morning to evening. Being a good host is the alpha and omega of our way of providing good service to our guests, so being a good hostess or host must lie deep in your DNA.

You are:

  • Either a trained waiter or has some years of experience or a willing to learn
  • Passionate about providing great service and driven by the daily guest contact
  • outgoing and positive
  • have an interest in wine, food and coffee and have strong attitudes about service
  • think it's fun when things are going fast

 

We can offer:

  • An exciting workplace in the heart of Copenhagen
  • An everyday life that is never boring
  • A good, positive working environment with good working conditions
  • Opportunity to grow in the company and get more responsibility
  • Opportunity to help continue and develop one of Copenhagen's classic cafés.

At Cafe Europa 1989, working hours vary, so you should expect day, weekend and evening work. We are currently looking for both part-time and full-time employees, so send in your application whether you are looking for full-time or part-time. As part of our team, you will be part of a team of both food and service enthusiasts across our now many departments, which consists of both Café Europa 1989, 16 canteens nationwide with associated café and restaurant operations and a coffee roastery. We are passionate about what we serve to our guests and we think it's fun to nerd with everything from food over beer, wine and to coffee. The passion for the good product and the desire to pass this on to our guests is central to us.

Does this sound interesting? Please send an application to jobs@europa1989.dk marked "Waiter Europa 1989" – we already have started recruiting for the summer-season, so the sooner we get your CV the better.
